mapper.select: SELECT SDS_NO as sds_no , BANK_NAME as bank_name , CASE WHEN CATEGORY_FIRST='animal' THEN '동물' WHEN CATEGORY_FIRST='human' THEN '인체유래' WHEN CATEGORY_FIRST='microorganism' THEN '미생물' WHEN CATEGORY_FIRST='plant' THEN '식물' END as category_1 , CASE WHEN CATEGORY_FIRST='animal' THEN CASE WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('animal extract') THEN '추출물' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('bioorganic', 'fresh frozen tissue') THEN '조직' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('cell line') THEN '세포,세포주' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('dry specimen', 'immersion specimen', 'paraffin block', 'slide-mounted specimen') THEN '표본' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('egg') THEN '배아' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('live animal') THEN '개체' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('nucleic acids') THEN 'DNA/RNA/Protein 유래물' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('serum', 'whole blood') THEN '체액' ELSE 'animal-오류' END WHEN CATEGORY_FIRST='human' THEN CASE WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('body fluid', 'plasma', 'saliva', 'serum', 'urine') THEN '체액' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('bone marrow mononuclear cell', 'cell line', 'peripheral blood mononuclear cell') THEN '세포,세포주' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('fixed tissue', 'fresh frozen tissue', 'histologic section') THEN '조직' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('nucleic acids') THEN 'DNA/RNA/Protein 유래물' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('paraffin block') THEN '표본' ELSE 'human-오류' END WHEN CATEGORY_FIRST='microorganism' THEN CASE WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('antibody') THEN '기타' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('bacteria', 'fungi', 'microalgae', 'mushroom', 'phage', 'virus') THEN '균주' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('microbial extract') THEN '추출물' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('nucleic acids') THEN 'DNA/RNA/Protein 유래물' ELSE 'microorganism-오류' END WHEN CATEGORY_FIRST='plant' THEN CASE WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('cell line') THEN '세포,세포주' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('nucleic acids') THEN 'DNA/RNA/Protein 유래물' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('plant') THEN '표본' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('plant extract') THEN '추출물' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('plant metabolite') THEN '기타' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('seed') THEN '종자' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('trophosome') THEN '추출물' WHEN CATEGORY_SECOND in ('pollen') THEN '추출물' ELSE 'plant-오류' END END as category_2 , GENUS as genus , SPECIES as species , ISO_SOURCE as iso_source , 'INS00006' as ins_cd , DEPOSIT as deposit , COUNTRY as country , DEPOSIT_ORGAN as deposit_organ , DEPOSIT_DATE as deposit_date , ISO_REGION as iso_region , ISO_DATE as iso_date , SDS_USE as sds_use , REG_DATE as reg_date , SALE_YN as sale_yn , RESOURCE_NAME as resource_name , ACCESSION_NO as accession_no , BANK_CODE as bank_code FROM T9_KNRRC_RESOURCE LIMIT #{pagingIndex}, #{paging}
